description.value:
Source Adventurer's Armory pg. 19
Price 5 gp; Weight 1 lb.
Category Adventuring Gear

Description

This item works like a standard wrist sheath, but releasing an item from it is a swift action. Preparing the sheath for this use requires cranking the sheathâ€™s tiny gears and springs into place (a full-round action that provokes an attack of opportunity).
